name: There is Work to be Done
name_original: There is Work to be Done
description:
Help the digi teacher reach his goal of finishing all tasks before heading for the summer vacation!

Controls:

KEYBOARD: WASD, ARROWS, SHIFT AND SPACE FOR JUMP, UP FOR USE COMPUTER

GAMEPAD: LEFT STICK FOR MOVEMENT, A JUMPS, B USES COMPUTER

TOUCH: LEFT EDGE MOVES, THREE JUMP BUTTONS FOR STATIC AND DIRECTIONAL JUMPS AND COMPUTER USE BUTTON

Music is on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/6LUp9zl2Q0dEpmJCdsLkir?si=2b7d07dfef734960
